name: Yurivania: Uhaul of the Night
description:
🌱🐍

Stheno the gorgon wants her girlfriend Alraune to move in, but to accommodate a plantgirl Stheno's room needs an overhaul!

Hopefully their castle community can provide everything they need to make the space comfy for both of them!

Explore the Midnight Palace, ask your girlfriends and other monstergirls for help, and make the perfect two-lady lovenest!

You might have to avoid some nasty traps or trounce a creepy human along the way, but in the end love always wins!

🎮
  • Arrow keys or WASD for movement
  • Alt, Z, or J for A Button
  • Ctrl, K, or X for B Button
  • Enter for Start Button
  • Shift for Select Button
🏰👭🕸️

This is my entry to YuriJam 2020: an adventure game with a metroidvania style. I used GBStudio 2 and bits of Jeremy Oduber's fonts.  My partner Caidence made the music.  All the source material is available on GitHub. 

Enjoy!

⚗️

Known Issues:

1. The human encounter is still occasionally not working on.
2. The ending sequence is missing an animation, and in general could use a little work.
3. There should be a mute button for the music, in case you want to play in a chill way.
4. The wind in the tower is a bit glitchy.  Rarely, you can get stuck in the wall.
5. The movement physics could stand some additional adjustment.
6. Sound effects to indicate an ouchie would be helpful!
7. Sound effects to indicate jumping would be helpful! (I'm not sure if this can be done with the current engine?)
8. Warnings to do with the music files are emitted during build, but the music seems to play fine....
9. Selecting from the pause menu while in front of an NPC will cause the NPC dialogue to happen before invoking the menu item. (This is an engine issue: https://github.com/chrismaltby/gb-studio/issues/468 , but maybe we can work around it?)
